breakdown.meaning: DeepSeek公司名称（DeepSeek是人工智能研究机构）
DeepSeek的AI大型模型，用于自然语言处理和相关任务。其中，“AI”表示人工智能，“大模型”强调其规模和能力。
发布该AI大模型后，预计会对行业或社会带来重大变化，这一点被形象地表达为“改变一切”。

chinese: DeepSeek日前发布其最新开源模型DeepSeek-R1
pinyin: Dīpū jiē rì qián fābù qí zǐjianguo kāi yuan módelu Dīpū jiē - R1
translation: DeepSeek recently released its latest open-source model, DeepSeek-R1.

breakdown.meaning: latest open-source model (最新 = latest, 开源 = open source, 模型 = model)

chinese: 用较低的成本达到了接近于OpenAI开发的GPT-o1的性能
pinyin: yòngrelǜde běinéng dashílėi jiēhū OpenAI kāiáo de GPT-o1 de suǒyóu xìnqiěyóu
translation: With relatively low costs, it has approached the level of performance comparable to GPT-o1 developed by OpenAI.

breakdown.meaning: cost (本 = one's own, 贵 = expensive)
a type of AI model developed by OpenAI, specifically a follow-up to GPT-4 with enhanced capabilities

chinese: 这一进展破解了全球人工智能产业长期以来'堆算力'的路径依赖
pinyin: Zhè yī zhàn chéng bù qū le quán shì rén gōu jìn shèng yè suǒ de yóu xū
translation: This development has unlocked the dependency paths of the global AI industry that have been reliant on 'compute power' for a long time.

breakdown.meaning: to unlock / to solve (破 = destruction; 解 = solution, 在此处指解决技术问题)
artificial intelligence industry (人类由人创造的技术系统)
dependency paths (技术或资源间的依赖关系)

chinese: 国际投行摩根士丹利表示
pinyin: Guójìng tóu huà Mógēn shídàn lì shì jiè
translation: International investment bank Morgan Stanley has announced this.

breakdown.meaning: international investment bank (国际 = international, 投行 = investment bank)
Morgan Stanley (摩根 = Morgan, 士丹利 = Dun & Bradstreet)

chinese: 更大
pinyin: Gēngdà
translation: Significantly larger/much bigger.

breakdown.meaning: more/less (used to indicate degree of change)

chinese: 的模型）不再等于更聪明
pinyin: déjiàn huánlǜ）bù zài děng kuàng hǎi qí yóu gèng chénmíng
translation: The model is no longer equivalent to greater intelligence.

breakdown.meaning: more intelligent (更 = more, 聪 = intelligence, 明 = bright)

chinese: DeepSeek通过显著提高数据质量和改进模型架构
pinyin: Dīpúbù qiúmen shǒuxiáng tóu suǒ jīàrì data zīliang yǔxué he gǎihuan móde lèxué jiégou
translation: DeepSeek significantly improves data quality and enhances model architecture through its outstanding performance.

chinese: 展示了一条
pinyin: shìjiǎo le一tóu
translation: Showed one example.

breakdown.meaning: to demonstrate, to show an example (示 = to show, 现 = present)
a particle indicating completion of action (了 = finished)
one example, one instance (一 = one, 条 = a line, model)

chinese: 不同的大模型之前的高效训练途径。
pinyin: bùdíng de dà móde lù qian前de gāo shì xūn xíng tú jìng。
translation: Different high-efficient training approaches for large models in the past.

breakdown.meaning: large model (大 = large, 模 = model/pattern)
high-efficient training (高 = high, 效 = efficiency)

chinese: 摩根士丹利说
pinyin: Móng kē Shì dān lì shuō
translation: Morgan Stanley said

breakdown.meaning: Stanley (士 = Stanley, 丹 = related to)
利益 / 收益 (利 = benefit / profit)

chinese: 深度求索的模型现在低成本优势突出
pinyin: Dī ǐ ngqǔ de mòdehuà shíjiān lǐ chéngbùn shuǒyóu túchū
translation: DeepSeek's model currently has a low-cost advantage that stands out.

chinese: 小李每天学习中文。
pinyin: Xiǎolǐ měitiān xuéxí Zhōngwén.
translation: Every day, Mr. Li learns Chinese.

breakdown.meaning: each day (每 = each, 天 = day)
to learn (学 = study, 习 = practice)
Chinese language (中 = middle/China, 文 = language/writing)

chinese: 国际知名大模型相比
pinyin: Guójìng zhī wù dà móde lǜ bǐ
translation: Internationally renowned large model compared to each other.

breakdown.meaning: compared to each other (相 = relationship/between, 比 = compare/measure)

chinese: 其成本大约低了一个数量级
pinyin: qí běn fán dào dī lǜ le yī zhǒng shǔǐ
translation: Its cost has roughly decreased by one order of magnitude.

breakdown.meaning: its, its (指 = point, 秩 = hierarchy)
roughly, approximately (大 = big, 约 = approximate)
one level/degree (一 = one, 级 = level)
magnitude, order of magnitude (数 = number, 级 = level)

chinese: 国泰君安指出
pinyin: Guótài Jūn'ān zhǐchuǒ
translation: Guotai Junan pointed out.

breakdown.meaning: Junan (could be a name or a phrase meaning 'public peace')

chinese: DeepSeek-R1以MIT License完全开源模型权重
pinyin: Dīpū Zhǎngbǐ Rìyào yǐ MIT Huāzuǒ wán quán kāiyuàn xuézhí shēnzhàng
translation: DeepSeek-R1 is released under the MIT License, making its model weights open source.

breakdown.full_meaning: A specific model developed by the company DeepSeek, named 'R1'.

breakdown.meaning: MIT License (MIT = Massachusetts Institute of Technology)
breakdown.full_meaning: A permissive software license commonly used in open-source projects.
Without any restrictions or conditions (全 = whole, 加 = add/complete)
Open source (开放 = open, 源 = source)
The weights of the model (模型 = model, 权重 = weight)

chinese: 并允许商用模型蒸馏
pinyin: nēiɛr shǒusǔu shāngyòng módelǔ dīngluò
translation: Allow commercial use of the model.

breakdown.meaning: to allow (允 = to allow, 且 = but; here used as a suffix)
commercial use (商 = business, 用 = to use)
model (模 = model/shape, 仿 = to imitate; together meaning 'model')
refine or extract (蒸 = refine/cook, 纯 = pure; used as a verb here)

chinese: 为开发者提供了二次创新的自由空间
pinyin: Wèi kāi yóu kǎi zhōumín qī huà chéng shàn qū
translation: For developers, there has been a doubling of creative freedom.

breakdown.pinyin: chuàngxué de zuòu qū kōng jiā
breakdown.meaning: creative freedom (创 = innovation, 新 = new, 的 = of)

chinese: 这是一项策略，推动中国首次在通用大模型开源领域占据技术制高点。
pinyin: Zhè yī shì zhōng lüè, tuī dòng Zhōngguó shǒu cì zài tōng yǒng dà huán kāi yuán liè shèng zhǎn jù sué zhí gaodìng.
translation: This is a strategy that drives China to achieve its first technological high point in the field of general-purpose large models through open-source initiatives.

breakdown.meaning: general-purpose large model (通=general, 用=purpose, 大=large, 模型=model)
technological high point (技=technology, 制=system, 高=high, 点=point)

chinese: 同时
pinyin: Zhīgē
translation: At the same time; simultaneously.

breakdown.meaning: at the same time, indicating that two or more events occur together.

chinese: 开源生态可能加速行业技术路线趋同
pinyin: Kāiyuán Bīngé kěnéi Jiǎcuó Yèshàng zhìhuórílù dǒngtóng.
translation: The open-source ecosystem might speed up the convergence of the industry's technological pathways.

breakdown.meaning: open source (开放 = open, 源 = source)

chinese: 通用大模型因同质化加剧竞争
pinyin: Tōngxuán dàimó shímǎo yīn qǔhuá jiārù jìngbòu
translation: General AI models face intensifying competition due to increasing homogenization.

breakdown.meaning: general use (通 = broad, 用 = application/usage)
large model (大 = big, 模型 = model)
to intensify/ to make more intense

chinese: 只有拥有真正领先技术的企业才能在这种趋势中留存
pinyin: shúiyóu yòngyóu zhēngjīng lièshǎng jìhuǒ de qūyxíng cái néi zǔ xué trend中 xiゅん shàng yóuxian jiushi liùcún
translation: If only companies with truly leading-edge technology can survive in such a trend.

breakdown.meaning: only, having (有 = to have/possess, 只 = only)
true leading-edge technology (正 = correct, 领先 = leading, 技术 = technology)
can, be able to (能 = able, 以 = with/in accordance)

breakdown.pinyin: zǔ xué trend中 xiゅん shàng yóuxian jiushi liùcún
breakdown.meaning: survive in such a trend (趋势 = trend, 中 = middle/China, 习 = to practice/culture)

chinese: 因此
pinyin: dǒng yí
translation: Therefore

breakdown.meaning: so that, therefore (表示原因或结果)
for, on behalf of (用于表示原因)

chinese: 此次国产开源模型的突破有望重塑全球AIGC技术路线及产业格局
pinyin: Cǐ shí guó yùan kāi yuán móde lèi de jié tuò有望重塑huónGBǎlá technological roadmap
translation: This time, the breakthrough in domestic open-source models has the potential to reshape the global AI-generated content (AIGC) technology roadmap and industrial landscape.

breakdown.pinyin: jié tuò huán gjí technological roadmap
shì yè huán gjí industrial landscape

chinese: 国泰君安还指出
pinyin: Guótài Jūnān hái zhǐ chū
translation: Mr. Guo Tai Junan has still pointed out.

breakdown.meaning: 国泰君安 (Guó = country, 泰 = peace; 君安 = composure or a specific name)
to point out, indicate (指 = to indicate/point out, 出 = exit or to produce)

chinese: DeepSeek-R1以开源
pinyin: Dīpūxiàng-R1 yǐ kāi yuán
translation: DeepSeek-R1 is an open-source project.

breakdown.meaning: A specific model or project name (DeepSeek-R1)
open source (开 = open, 源 = origin)

chinese: 高性能及低成本API对标OpenAI o1
pinyin: Gāojí yùn能力及dībiàngžǎng API duì biǎn OpenAI o1
translation: High-performance and low-cost API against OpenAI O1

breakdown.meaning: high performance (高 = high, 性能 = capability)
low cost (低 = low, 成本 = expense)
Open Artificial Intelligence (open source AI project)
a specific version or model of OpenAI's API

chinese: 其蒸馏模型的优异表现将支持消费电子
pinyin: qí shī jiǎo móde qū xiàbǐ jīng zǔ yóu xiào biǎo qiú zhī xù gōng yuàn tóu
translation: Its distillation model demonstrates superior performance and will support consumer electronics.

breakdown.meaning: distillation model (通过反馈迭代优化得到的高效语言模型)
superior performance (优 = excellent, ester, 进行者)
consumer electronics (消费 = consumption, 电子 = electronics)

chinese: 智能驾驶等终端AI的部署
pinyin: Zhīnǎng shìqǐ děi zhōngduán AI de bùshèu
translation: Intelligent driving and terminal AI deployment.

chinese: 开源策略将重整通用模型竞争格局
pinyin: Kāiyóu cèlǐ jiāng zhōng yàn yǒng móde lèvel competitors.
translation: An open-source strategy will be used to reform the general model competition framework.

breakdown.meaning: strategy (策 = strategy, 利 = benefit/利益)

chinese: 大模型的商业化落地将在DeepSeek的低价API支持下加速
pinyin: Dàimóde shàngwùyú huódòng jié gōng yóu DeepSeek de lòujiàn API zhījǐe zǔxū xiulāng
translation: The commercialization of large models will accelerate under the low-cost API support from DeepSeek.

breakdown.meaning: large model (大 = big, 模型 = model)
landing / implementation (落 = fall/carry, 地 = ground/land)
of DeepSeek (DeepSeek = name of a company or organization)
low-cost API (low = low, 价 = price, API = Application Programming Interface)

chinese: 该券商表示
pinyin: Gěi qūan shāng biǎng shì
translation: This company states

breakdown.meaning: 券商（券 = bond/coupon, 商 = business/commerce）
to state/declare (师 = teacher, 伽 = ?; 伽 is not a standard character, may be mistaken)

chinese: R1在后训练阶段通过大规模强化学习技术。
pinyin: R1 zai hou training qiqong shiliang qifa xue shibian technology.
translation: During the post-training stage, R1 achieved significant progress through large-scale reinforcement learning technology.

breakdown.meaning: An abbreviation or placeholder for a model or entity.
Training phase or stage (训 = to train, 阶 = stage)

breakdown.pinyin: da qi e qiqong shiliang xue shibian technology
breakdown.meaning: Large-scale reinforcement learning technology (大 = large, 规模 = scale, 强化 = reinforce, 学习 = learn, 技术 = technology)

chinese: 在极少标注数据下提升推理能力
pinyin: Zài jí hǎo biāncǐ shǒuxué yóu shèng niàn cībiàn qī xué shí zhōngwén。
translation: Under limited annotated data, the reasoning capability is enhanced.

breakdown.meaning: very few (极 = very, 少 = few)
annotated data (标 = mark/annotation, 注 = annotation/prompt, 数据 = data)
in, at, within (介于 = between; 位置 = location)
reasoning ability (推 = to reason, 理 = logic, 能力 = ability)

chinese: 验证了算法优化的高效性
pinyin: Shìjiànle gòngyè de huóxiàxué
translation: The verification of algorithm optimization efficiency.

breakdown.meaning: Verified/confirmed (证 = to confirm, 实 = real, 刍 = to examine)
Optimization (优 = excellent/more, ize = to make better)
Efficiency (高 = high, 效 = effective, 性 = characteristic)

chinese: 这是一项技术突破，打破了海外企业在复杂任务上的技术垄断。
pinyin: Zhè shì yī xù shí biàn，dǎ baǐ lióu qū qǔ shì jieténg zhi wai qǐ gong zuò dǎng shàng de jiētè gānpài。
translation: This is a technological breakthrough that has broken the technology monopoly of foreign companies in complex tasks.

breakdown.meaning: to break; to destroy (打 = hit, 破 = destroy)

breakdown.phrase: 海外企业在复杂任务上的技术垄断
breakdown.pinyin: lióu qū qǔ shì jiētè gānpài
breakdown.meaning: the technology monopoly of foreign companies in complex tasks

chinese: 为中国大模型技术参
pinyin: yúZhōngguódàmǒodeluóshìcán
translation: For the great Chinese model technology participation.

breakdown.meaning: large model technology participation (大 = large, 模型 = model, 技术 = technology, 参 = participate)

chinese: 全球竞争提供了实证支撑
pinyin: Qùóbǎo jìngzhàng zhǐyǒu le shí yóuzhi bī jī huódong
translation: Global competition has provided empirical support.

breakdown.pinyin: zhǐyǒu le shí yóuzhi bī jī huódong
breakdown.meaning: has provided empirical support (提供 = provide, 实证 = evidence/proof, 支撑 = support)

chinese: 每日经济新闻综合证券时报
pinyin: Měicíjīxuéxìngzǒngzhèngshí shíbào
translation: Daily Economic News Comprehensive Securities Report

breakdown.meaning: daily (每 = every day, 日 = day)
newspaper report (时 = time, 报 = to report)

chinese: 华为云官方微信公众号
pinyin: Huáwài yūn guān fēi wèixīng gǔnzǐhào
translation: Please follow the official 'WeChat Public Number' of Huawei Cloud.

chinese: 腾讯云每日经济新闻
pinyin: Téngxùn yún Měitiān jījìu xīnwén
translation: Every day's economic news from Tencent Cloud.

breakdown.meaning: Tencent Cloud (腾 = lively, 讯 = information; 云 = cloud)
every day (每 = every, 日 = sun/day)
economic news (经 = finance/economy, 瞿 = news)
